snippet: Mitt Romney's arrival at a New Jersey fund-raiser capped a breakneck drive along New Jersey's highways followed by a surreal pursuit by an Orthodox wedding party, according to a pool report.
abstract: Mitt Romney's arrival at a New Jersey fund-raiser capped a breakneck drive along New Jersey's highways followed by a surreal pursuit by an Orthodox wedding party, according to a pool report.

headline.main: Romney Makes a Surprise Stop at a New Jersey Wedding
headline.print_headline: At a New Jersey Wedding, a Surprise Stop by Romney
